title.rendered: Why You Should Sell Us Your Junk Car

content.rendered:
Do you have an old junker that doesn’t work anymore? Is it just sitting in your yard or garage and taking up space? Let us take it off your hands! In addition to providing used auto parts, Aero Auto Parts is one of the top junk dealers in Chicago. With us, you have a few options when it comes to getting rid of your junk car that you no longer use. Bring the car to our salvage yard and we’ll give you cash on the spot, or take advantage of our removal service where we haul it away for you! No matter the method you choose, here is why you should sell your junk car to Aero Auto Parts:

Make Fast Cash

Get the quick cash you need when you sell us your junk car. Whether you bring the vehicle to us or want us to pick it up from your home, we will pay you cash the same day. Take your fast cash and invest it into your next car project or repair!

Don’t Stress About Fixing The Car

Working tirelessly to repair a car that has passed its prime can be stressful and exhausting. If you are fed up trying to get your vehicle running year after year, let us take it off your hands and pay you for it! You can put this money towards

Free Up Space Around Your Home

Get rid of the junker that’s taking up valuable space around your home. Not only can it be and eyesore and a bit embarrassing to have a junk vehicle sitting in your yard, but it may be taking up space in your yard or garage that can be better used from something else.

If you have an old car that’s more of a hassle than it’s worth, call Aero Auto Parts today to schedule a pickup!
